name: Philippe

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Leave me alone. Haven't you done enough?

topics.topic_text: Yes, sir.
topics.response_text: Don't make eye contact with me! Look at the floor. And get back to work!

topics.topic_text: I think you may have me confused with someone else.
topics.response_text: Oh really? So despite your filthy face and your vacant expression and your complete lack of human dignity, you're telling me you're not a server?{angry and sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: Who do you think you are, talking to me that way?
topics.response_text: Who do-? Who the fuck do you think I am? I'm the fucking god of New Vegas brahmin fusion cuisine, that's who.{Repeating back "who do you think you are?" stunned that someone would dare ask.}

topics.topic_text: [Attack] You'll be feeding birds when I'm through with you.
topics.response_text: I'll carve that stupid look off your inbred face!{about to attack with a knife.}

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Oh no, you have it right. I'm a server.
topics.response_text: Well then why the fuck are you still standing there like you aren't the lowest form of life ever to be flushed down the evolutionary toilet?

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I'm here to talk business.  Interested in putting out a cookbook?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] What, me? The supreme ruler of the Nevada dining scene? Teach lowlife half-wits to make food that doesn't smell like burning excrement?

topics.topic_text: Hey, could I, uh, buy some of your recipes?
topics.response_text: Yes, of course.{sweetly}

topics.topic_text: You're screwed up in the head.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Yeah. You know why? It gets worse every time some sniveling wet blanket cries about how I need to tiptoe around his precious feelings.

topics.topic_text: Your predisposition towards anger suggests unresolved issues in your past.
topics.response_text: [?] What kind of harebrained fucking psychobabble bullshit is that?

topics.topic_text: I'm a new honorary member of the White Glove Society.
topics.response_text: Well what do you want? I'm very busy here.

topics.topic_text: You may be projecting. Tell me more about your parents.
topics.response_text: [?] Oh. I see how it is. You think because my father walked out on us when I was five, now I have to yell at people.

topics.topic_text: What about the banquet?
topics.response_text: Forget about the fucking banquet. You know what? You can do it. You be the star chef. Take my recipes.

topics.topic_text: You go do that, then.
topics.response_text: How could they treat me like that?{to himself, sadly}

topics.topic_text: I was just wondering where I could find tonight's wines.
topics.response_text: Well why don't you fucking try checking the serving table in the wine room, for fuck's sake? Circular room, two rooms down? Ring any bells? Christ!

topics.topic_text: It'll be huge. I'll advance you a hundred caps, plus half the gross.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Don't get me wrong, I love my job here, but they don't pay me what I'm worth. Too many people skimming off the top.

topics.topic_text: Yes. We're a major publisher. But as a sign of good faith I'll need recipes.
topics.response_text: <grunts> You're pushing your luck. Here. I have a few copies on me. This better be good enough.

topics.topic_text: Uh... how about you give me your recipes and then we'll see.
topics.response_text: Yes, of course.{sweetly}

topics.topic_text: I'll advance you a hundred caps and then... wait, I don't have that much on me.
topics.response_text: A hundred caps? I have that much between the cushions of my day bed.

topics.topic_text: I think I saw a radroach in the pantry. You should check it out.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] No! It'll ruin my ingredients!

topics.topic_text: Would you, uh, go step in the pantry for a minute?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Now why the fuck would I do that? I don't have time for games. Stop wasting my time.

conversation.response_text: You get back here with our dinner!
What the- ? You son of a- ! Goddamn motherf- ! Ugh! Let me out!

description:
Philippe is a 48 year-old Caucasian Male.

A stern-faced Caucasian man in his late 40s with a perpetually angry expression and an imposing posture. Despite his meticulous appearance as head chef, his eyes betray deep-seated trauma and frustration.

Philippe's Personality: Aggressive, abusive, and controlling. Philippe masks his childhood trauma with a facade of enjoying his cruelty toward others. He is meticulous in his work but takes out his frustrations on his subordinates, believing they 'deserve' his verbal abuse.

Philippe's Backstory: Philippe's childhood was marked by abandonment and abuse. When he was five, his father left the family, leading his chem-addicted mother to bring home a series of unstable men. His sisters would frequently lock him in a shipping crate, and he experienced an unspecified traumatic incident involving his brother. These experiences shaped his aggressive personality. As an adult, he rose to become the head chef of the Gourmand restaurant at the Ultra-Luxe after the White Glove Society joined Mr. House's Free Economic Zone.
